[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lint-ts-index/core](./core.md)

## core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Config](./core.config.md) | lint-ts-index configuration. Fields can be validated using the <code>class-validator</code> library. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getIndexExports(index)](./core.getindexexports.md) | Returns the files or directories exported by the given <code>index.ts</code> file. |
|  [lint(fix, onMissing)](./core.lint.md) | Run the linter in the current working directory. |
|  [lintDirectory(directory, config, fix, onMissing)](./core.lintdirectory.md) | Lint the specified directory and its children. |
|  [lintIndexExports(index, expSrc, exclude, fix, onMissing)](./core.lintindexexports.md) | Lint the specified <code>index.ts</code> exports against the content of its directory. |
|  [loadConfig()](./core.loadconfig.md) | Tries to find and load a lint-ts-index configuration. Recursively searches for RC and .indexignore files. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IConfig](./core.iconfig.md) | Base interface of a lint-ts-index configuration. It can be used to declare a partial configuration instead of directly using the [Config](./core.config.md) class which is more restrictive to declare values. |
